sentence.Network_en: The floorcovering you select will need to be impervious to water.
sentence.Network_cn: 挑选的地板材料必须是防水的。

sentence.Network_en: The political system there has been impervious to all suggestions of change.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里的政治体制对于所有的改革建议一概置之不理。

sentence.Network_en: He remained impervious to all Nell's sulks and blandishments.
sentence.Network_cn: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语,他都无动于衷.

医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... impermeable 不可渗透的 impervious 不可渗透的 impetigo 脓疱病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin impervius (from in- 'not' + pervius 'pervious') + -ous

entry.tran: 无动于衷的;不受影响的
entry.def: If you are impervious to someone's actions, you are not affected or influenced by them.

example.ex: She seems almost impervious to the criticism from all sides...
example.tran: 对于来自各方的指责,她似乎无动于衷。

example.ex: The political system there has been impervious to all suggestions of change.
example.tran: 那里的政治体制对于所有的改革建议一概置之不理。

entry.tran: 防渗漏的;不能渗透的;不能穿过的
entry.def: Something that is impervious to water, heat, or a particular object is able to resist it or stop it passing through it.

example.ex: The floorcovering you select will need to be impervious to water.
example.tran: 挑选的地板材料必须是防水的。

means.word_mean: 1. not admitting of passage or capable of being affected;

auth_sentence.content: They are massively powerful and almost impervious to pain.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are massively powerful and almost impervious to pain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are massively powerful and almost impervious to pain.

auth_sentence.content: North Korea is all but impervious to outside pressure.
auth_sentence.res_content: North Korea is all but impervious to outside pressure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: North Korea is all but impervious to outside pressure.

auth_sentence.content: But most solid tumors were impervious to it, too.
auth_sentence.res_content: But most solid tumors were impervious to it, too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But most solid tumors were impervious to it, too.

means.word_mean: 无动于衷的,不受影响的

sentences.en: He remained impervious to all Nell’s sulks and blandishments.
sentences.cn: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语,他都无动于衷。

sentences.en: He was completely impervious to criticism.
She was impervious to his charms.
sentences.cn: 他的魅力不能令她动心。
